section.title: Dashboard prerequisites
section.para: To access the OpenStack dashboard, your cloud operator must install prerequisite software and create an Identity Service user with sudo privileges for you.
To access the dashboard, ask your cloud operator for the following information:

listitem.para: The public IP address from which you can access the dashboard.

section.para: You will access the dashboard through a web browser on your local machine. This web browser must support HTML5 and have cookies and JavaScript enabled.

note.para: To use the VNC client with the dashboard, the browser must support HTML5 Canvas and HTML5 WebSockets.
For details about browsers that support noVNC, see https://github.com/kanaka/noVNC/blob/master/README.md, and https://github.com/kanaka/noVNC/wiki/Browser-support, respectively.
